item.name: /api/v1/users/:userId
item.description: This endpoint performs an updates operation on a user profile based on the provided parametersThis update operation can span multiple services on specific cases (such as when the client is explicitly attempting to update the email of the user)All update operations are atomic by nature hence we should not expect any form of divergent state
